> Hydras:
>   
>  "Be careful to not show personality faults"hissed  Hydras "As far as
> the femme named Nightlight is in your grasp leave the base and  we
> have to do a little exchange, the clone tht would be the bait would
> be here  and the true one will go to our new base. With the clone we
> can ambush Rodimus  here and maybe we could have some fun"
>
> ::Jhiaxus/Hevng::
> 
> Jhiaxus rested back in the chair he was in and allowed his thoughts
> to control the puppet.
> 
> Hevng took the equipment and transformed to beast mode. The beast bot
> exited the Predacon base heading for Atlantis.
      
Myrmidon nodded as he listend to the interchange between this puppet
and Hydras. He tilted his head as he thought carefully. "I thought I
heard someone mention that Atlantis is under siege. If Rodimus is
injured, will he come after his wife, or will he send someone else?"

Myrmidon shrugged at his own statement, curious how this subterfuge
would turn out. He sat back, and along with Hydras, he simply waited
for it all to unfold.

Preston
(Myrmidon)
